caption.p: Alignment of the amino acid sequences of crystallised main proteases of SARS-CoV-2 (PDB: 6Y2E), SARS-CoV (PDB: 2BX4) and MERS-CoV (PDB: 5C3N). Domains I, II and III comprise residues 8–101, 102–184 and 201–306, respectively. The catalytic dyads are indicated by asterisks. The alignment was generated using T-Coffee and shaded with Boxshade.
